name: MCSDInfo
0:
”Alexa, ask my school what cycle day it is”
”Alexa, ask my school what cycle day will it be on Tuesday”
”Alexa, ask my school when is the next holiday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my school
des: Students in the Mifflin County School District can ask for information about what the current cycle day is, as well as about upcoming Act 80 days and holidays.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
